name: get_business_profile_data
description: Get profile data of a TikTok account, including analytics and insights.

access_token.description: An access token authorized by TikTok creators.

business_id.description: Unique, application-specific identifier for the TikTok account.

start_date.description: The query start date in `YYYY-MM-DD` format; defaults to `None`.

end_date.description: The query end date in `YYYY-MM-DD` format, defaulting to None.

fields.description: A list of fields to include in the response, defaulting to `None`, with available options: `username`, `display_name`, `profile`, `analytics`, and `settings`.

name: get_business_publish_status
description: Get the publishing status of a TikTok video or photo post, indicating its completion or in-progress state.

access_token.description: An access token authorized by TikTok creators.

business_id.description: A unique, application-specific identifier for the TikTok account.

publish_id.description: Unique identifier for a post publishing task.

name: publish_business_video
description: Publish a public video post to a TikTok account, with options to customize its visibility and interaction settings.

access_token.description: An access token authorized by TikTok creators.

business_id.description: A unique, application-specific identifier for the TikTok account.

video_url.description: URL of the video to be published.

post_info.description: A dictionary containing additional post information such as the video's title, description, tags, thumbnail URL and offset, and AI-generation status.

tags.description: Video tags provided as a list of strings.

thumbnail_url.description: URL of the thumbnail for the video.

thumbnail_offset.description: Time offset in seconds for video thumbnail.

caption.description: The caption text for the video, defaulting to `None`.

is_brand_organic.description: Specifies if the post is organic branded content; defaults to `False`.

is_branded_content.description: Indicates if the post is branded content. Defaults to `False`.

disable_comment.description: Whether to disable comments; defaults to `False`.

disable_duet.description: Controls whether the duet feature is disabled; defaults to `False`.

disable_stitch.description: Whether to disable the stitch feature, defaulting to `False`.

thumbnail_offset.description: Time offset in seconds for the video thumbnail; defaults to 0.

is_ai_generated.description: Indicates if the content is AI-generated; defaults to `False`.

upload_to_draft.description: Save as draft instead of publishing; defaults to `False`.
